assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Pegcetacoplan_Initial_Initiation_Q24
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText:
What quality of life improvement is expected with response to therapy?
Quality of life improvement expected: Improvement in functional status, fatigue, becoming transfusion independent or significant reduction in transfusion requirement and either stabilizing or improving any organ dysfunction related to PNH (pulmonary hypertension, kidney impairment, prevention of thrombosis)
